Title: Aiding the Accord: Sniffenseeking
Description:
Our allies once again seek your assistance as our efforts continue across the Isles. Words within the walls of Valdrakken whisper a resounding comfort knowing your efforts have helped shape our future.

Now then, to business.

Our niffen allies in Zaralek Cavern are always on the lookout for something new and exciting--or smelly. Join them on a dig through the many lost and forgotten caverns in their domain, and see what you find.

We await your return, $n.
ObjectivesText: Travel to Zaralek Cavern and accompany Myrrit in Loamm on a dig underground. Continue your efforts in aiding the Valdrakken Accord and their allies throughout the Dragon Isles.
